markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Life-Giving Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=990) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 32 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per minute

**Trigger**
You cast an innate spell from a gnome heritage or ancestry feat.

</column>

---

The upwelling of innate magic refreshes your body. You gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to half your level (minimum 1) that last until the end of your next turn.
name: Life-Giving Magic
